about_the_game:
Play as the boy named HERO in this thrilling anime-inspired Beat Em Up game. beat everyone in the school and save your beloved girlfriend! this game have everything! nice story, cool anime style cutscenes, and a lot of punches and kicks!!

STORY

As the new kid in school, you find yourself entangled in a web of dark conspiracies when a malevolent group kidnaps your beloved girlfriend. Armed with martial arts prowess and an unyielding determination, dive into action to save her from the clutches of evil.

Key Features

- Story mode - Arcade mode or Survival mode!

- Interesting story line with cool anime cutscenes.

- Stunning pixel art mixed with anime to give a unique modern blend of arcade-style action.

- Multiple levels with cool colorful backgrounds to battle your way through.

- Many weapons to grab, Many enemies to beat! you can grab and throw them too!

- XP SYSTEM to level up your HERO to become POWERFULL!

- Shop to buy 1up, experiense, energy or health!

- Classic arcade beat-‘em-up gameplay with so many new mechanics.

- Choose Difficulty

- Unlock Cute Pets s support in battle!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible soundcard

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible soundcard
